rooms.description: An accessible entrance hall with a wide opening to accommodate wheelchairs. Equipped with tactile guiding strips and appropriate lighting.
Spacious Scandinavian living room with natural light and open plan design. Features a wheelchair accessible layout.
Modern Scandinavian kitchen with streamlined cabinetry and integrated appliances. Designed for accessibility.
Adjacent dining area with flexible seating arrangements. Wheelchair accessible layout and ample space.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible main entrance with ramps and automatic door systems.
Accessible balcony access to the bedroom on ground floor.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a Scandinavian aesthetic and accessible design. Includes wheelchair-friendly walk-in closet.
Secondary bedroom with a large balcony designed for wheelchair accessibility. Scandinavian decor and ample natural lighting.
Guest bedroom with minimalistic Scandinavian furniture and accessible features. Includes a built-in wardrobe.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible balcony attached to master bedroom 1, offering serene views and ventilation.
Wheelchair accessible balcony attached to master bedroom 2, designed with safety railings and ample space.

rooms.description: A Scandinavian study room with ample natural light and ergonomic furniture. Accessible for wheelchair users.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars and non-slip flooring. Scandinavian fixtures and open design.
Compact utility room with Scandinavian finishes, including storage for cleaning supplies and accessible layout.

openings.description: Accessible balcony attached to the study room for additional natural lighting and ventilation.
